NOTICE_DATA.ORIGINAL_CPV: Construction works for plants, mining and manufacturing and for buildings relating to the oil and gas industry

CODIF_DATA.TD_DOCUMENT_TYPE: Prior information notice without call for competition
CODIF_DATA.HEADING: 01A01

TI_TEXT.P: Строителни и монтажни работи по общо изграждане на електроцентрали и строителни съоръжения за добивната и преработващата промишленост
Stavební úpravy pro továrny, důlní činnost, průmyslovou výrobu a budovy sloužící ropnému a plynárenskému průmyslu
Bygge- og anlægsarbejde i forbindelse med kraftværker, mineanlæg og fremstillingsvirksomheder samt bygninger i tilknytning til olie- og gasindustrien
Bauarbeiten für Kraftwerke, Bergbau- und Produktionsanlagen und für Gebäude der Öl- und Gasindustrie
Κατασκευαστικές εργασίες για μονάδες ηλεκτροπαραγωγής, καθώς και για τον εξορυκτικό και μεταποιητικό τομέα και για κτίρια βιομηχανίας πετρελαίου και αερίου
Construction works for plants, mining and manufacturing and for buildings relating to the oil and gas industry
Trabajos de construcción de plantas, de instalaciones para la minería y la industria y de edificios relacionados con la industria del gas y del petróleo
Tehaste, kaevandus- ja tootmisettevõtete ning nafta- ja gaasitööstushoonete ehitustööd
Tehtaiden, laitosten, kaivosten, verstaiden, pajojen sekä öljy- ja kaasuteollisuuden rakennusten rakentamistyöt
Travaux de construction d'usines, d'exploitations minières et d'unités de fabrication et de bâtiments pour l'industrie du pétrole et du gaz
Construction works for plants, mining and manufacturing and for buildings relating to the oil and gas industry
Građevinski radovi na energetskim objektima, rudarskim i proizvodnim objektima i građevinama vezanim za naftnu i plinsku industriju
Erőművek, bányászati és termelőlétesítmények, olaj- és gáziparhoz kapcsolódó épületek kivitelezése
Lavori di costruzione per centrali elettriche, attività estrattive e manifatturiere, l'industria del gas e del petrolio
Gamyklų, kasybos, apdirbamosios gamybos ir dujų bei naftos pramonės statinių statybos darbai
Iekārtu, raktuvju un ražotņu celtniecības darbi un ar naftas un dabasgāzes rūpniecību saistītu būvju celtniecības darbi
Xogħol tal-kostruzzjoni għall-impjanti, minieri u manifattura ta’ bini relatat ma’ l-industrija taż-żejt u tal-gass
Bouwwerkzaamheden voor krachtcentrale, mijnbouw en industrie, en voor gebouwen in verband met olie- en gasindustrie
Roboty w zakresie instalowania, wydobycia produkcji oraz budowy obiektów budowlanych przemysłu naftowego i gazowniczego
Construção relacionada com centrais eléctricas e as indústrias extractiva e transformadora e construção relacionada com a indústria do petróleo e do gás
Lucrări de construcţii de uzine, de exploatări miniere şi de uzine de fabricaţie şi de construcţii pentru industria petrolului şi a gazului
Výstavba objektov pre ťažbu a výrobu a budov súvisiacich s ropným a plynárenským priemyslom
Gradbena dela na energetskih objektih, rudarskih in proizvodnih objektih ter na stavbah, povezanih z naftno in plinsko industrijo
Bygg- och anläggningsarbeten: kraftverk, gruv- och produktionsanläggningar samt byggnader inom olje- och gasindustrin

TITLE.P: Manufacture, Supply and Install of Duct work

SHORT_DESCR.P: EPUK Investments are looking to gauge Supply Chain interest in the supply and install of dampers and ductwork. It is not known at this stage if this will be a tendered requirement or awarded to a existing supplier of EPUK.
Procurement to consist of the Manufacture, delivery and install of Duct work to Client specified designs.

INFO_ADD.P: Any suppliers who would like to register an interest in this procurement are asked to email Jamie Holiday on Jamie.holiday@epuki.co.uk who will note your interest and ensure if this proceeds to Tender you will be duly notified. It should be noted that timelines are tight for this requirement as the manufactured ducting is required to coincide with a planned outage in March 2020, to allow install during a planned shut down minimising disruption to power generation and costs.

ADDRESS_REVIEW_BODY.OFFICIALNAME: High Court of Justice in Northern Ireland
ADDRESS_REVIEW_BODY.ADDRESS: Royal Courts of Justice, Chichester Street
